function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus transmission in built environments from human interaction","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control occupant density, airflow, and surface sanitation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, occupancy tracking systems, touchless interfaces","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, small business owners, epidemiologists","Owner":"Building designers, facility managers, business owners, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Virtual interviews using Zoom due to pandemic lockdown","Impact":"Reduced in-person contact and potential for virus transmission","Mitigation":"Using virtual communication platforms, following public health guidelines for virtual interaction","Technologies":"Zoom, virtual meeting platforms, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Interview participants, interviewers","Owner":"Organizations conducting the interviews, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Sharing physical tools (mouse and keyboard) during system testing","Impact":"Potential for virus transmission through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Providing individual tools for each participant, implementing sanitation protocols for shared tools","Technologies":"Individual mouse and keyboard setups, sanitization equipment","People":"System testers, interviewers","Owner":"Organizations conducting the system testing, public health authorities"}]}
